data.name: Those Who Came: Healing Solarus Demo
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy a single player refreshing experience of the upcoming Those who Came in its final shape, exploring one of Bineok’s facilities and feel how it is to heal a bit of Solarus.

Those Who Came is a cooperative survival game with RPG elements where you will have to work with other players as a team to survive and thrive on a hostile planet. You are one of the last of the Sainen -- a strong and resilient species, who faced near-extinction after their planet collapsed. Hoping that their species would survive this cataclysm, they fled in a ship, frozen in a cryogenic state.

After some years, the ship Hermaion detects a suitable planet. And thus, your mission begins: heal the deadly planet of Solarus and build a new home. Discover their inhabitants Torek, create a strong relationship and master the different ways to use the environment's energy for healing Solarus!
